item.title: Manning Book, Effective Platform Engineering
item.description:
Summary: Myself and 3 other Thoughtworkers (one now an ex-thoughtworker and is the current CTO of Brillio) are engaged in a contract with Manning publishers to write a book on Platform Engineering.

Author(s): Sean Alvarez, Ajay Chankramath, Nic Cheneweth, Bryan Oliver Expected Publish date: MEAP (Manning Early Access Program) expected in Q4, 2024.
